member.name: T:Shared.Entities.AddressEntity
member.summary: Represents a address entity in the system. Contains Address definition information including version, name, and JSON Address definition.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.AddressEntity.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection string value. This provides connection information for the address entity.

member.name: M:Shared.Entities.AddressEntity.GetCompositeKey
member.summary: Gets the composite key for this address entity. The composite key is formed by connection string.
member.returns: A string in the format "ConnectionString" that uniquely identifies this address.

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.AssignmentEntity
member.summary: Represents a assignment entity in the system. Contains Assignment information including version, name, step ID, and entity IDs.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.AssignmentEntity.StepId
member.summary: Gets or sets the step identifier. This references the step that this assignment is associated with.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.AssignmentEntity.EntityIds
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of entity identifiers. This contains the IDs of entities associated with this assignment.

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.Base.BaseEntity
member.summary: Base entity class that provides common properties and functionality for all entities.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.Base.BaseEntity.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the entity. MongoDB will auto-generate this value when the entity is created.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.Base.BaseEntity.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the schema. This is used to track different versions of the same schema. Must follow the pattern d.d.d where d is a digit (e.g., 1.0.0, 2.1.3).

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.Base.BaseEntity.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the schema. This provides a human-readable identifier for the schema.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.Base.BaseEntity.CreatedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp when the entity was created.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.Base.BaseEntity.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp when the entity was last updated.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.Base.BaseEntity.CreatedBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the user who created the entity.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.Base.BaseEntity.UpdatedBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the user who last updated the entity.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.Base.BaseEntity.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the entity.

member.name: M:Shared.Entities.Base.BaseEntity.GetCompositeKey
member.summary: Gets the composite key for this schema entity. The composite key is formed by combining the version and name.
member.returns: A string in the format "Version_Name" that uniquely identifies this schema.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.Base.BaseEntity.IsNew
member.summary: Helper method to check if entity is new (no ID assigned yet).
member.returns: True if the entity is new (ID is empty), false otherwise.

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.DeliveryEntity
member.summary: Represents a delivery entity in the system. Contains Delivery payload information including version, name, and payload data.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.DeliveryEntity.Payload
member.summary: Gets or sets the payload data. This contains the actual delivery payload content.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.DeliveryEntity.SchemaId
member.summary: Gets or sets the schema identifier. This links the delivery entity to a specific schema. Note: Required for Delivery entities, optional for Address entities (handled at controller level).

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.Enums.StepEntryCondition
member.summary: Defines the entry conditions that determine when a step should be executed. These conditions control the workflow execution logic and step transitions. Direct mapping to ActivityExecutionStatus values for precise control.

member.name: F:Shared.Entities.Enums.StepEntryCondition.PreviousProcessing
member.summary: Execute only if the previous step is still processing. Useful for monitoring or parallel processing scenarios.

member.name: F:Shared.Entities.Enums.StepEntryCondition.PreviousCompleted
member.summary: Execute only if the previous step completed successfully. This is the standard behavior for most workflow steps.

member.name: F:Shared.Entities.Enums.StepEntryCondition.PreviousFailed
member.summary: Execute only if the previous step failed with an error. Useful for error handling, cleanup, or alternative processing paths.

member.name: F:Shared.Entities.Enums.StepEntryCondition.PreviousCancelled
member.summary: Execute only if the previous step was cancelled. Useful for cleanup or cancellation handling workflows.

member.name: F:Shared.Entities.Enums.StepEntryCondition.Always
member.summary: Always execute this step regardless of previous step results. Useful for initialization, logging, or mandatory processing steps.

member.name: F:Shared.Entities.Enums.StepEntryCondition.Never
member.summary: Never execute this step - it is disabled. Useful for temporarily disabling steps without removing them.

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.OrchestratedFlowEntity
member.summary: Represents a orchestratedflow entity in the system. Contains OrchestratedFlow information including version, name, workflow reference, and assignment references.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.OrchestratedFlowEntity.WorkflowId
member.summary: Gets or sets the workflow identifier. This references the WorkflowEntity that this orchestrated flow is based on.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.OrchestratedFlowEntity.AssignmentIds
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of assignment identifiers. This defines the assignments that are part of this orchestrated flow. Can be empty if no assignments are currently associated.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.OrchestratedFlowEntity.CronExpression
member.summary: Gets or sets the cron expression for scheduled execution. This defines when the orchestrated flow should be automatically executed. Can be null if no scheduling is required (manual execution only). Example: "0 0 12 * * ?" for daily at noon

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.OrchestratedFlowEntity.IsScheduleEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the scheduled execution is currently enabled. This allows temporarily disabling scheduled execution without removing the cron expression.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.OrchestratedFlowEntity.IsOneTimeExecution
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this orchestrated flow should execute only once. When true, the scheduler job will automatically stop after the first execution. The orchestration remains active for manual triggering.

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.PluginEntity
member.summary: Represents a plugin entity in the system. Contains plugin information including version, name, schema validation settings, assembly details, and execution configuration. Inherits from BaseEntity to provide core entity functionality without delivery-specific properties.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.PluginEntity.InputSchemaId
member.summary: Gets or sets the input schema identifier. This references the schema used for input validation (optional).

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.PluginEntity.OutputSchemaId
member.summary: Gets or sets the output schema identifier. This references the schema used for output validation (optional).

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.PluginEntity.EnableInputValidation
member.summary: Gets or sets whether input validation is enabled for this plugin. When true, input data will be validated against the InputSchema before processing.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.PluginEntity.EnableOutputValidation
member.summary: Gets or sets whether output validation is enabled for this plugin. When true, output data will be validated against the OutputSchema after processing.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.PluginEntity.AssemblyBasePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the base path where the plugin assembly is located. This is the directory path containing the plugin assembly file.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.PluginEntity.AssemblyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the plugin assembly file. This is the filename (with extension) of the assembly containing the plugin implementation.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.PluginEntity.AssemblyVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the plugin assembly. This represents the version of the compiled assembly file. Must follow the format d.d.d.d where d is a digit (e.g., 1.0.0.0, 2.1.3.4).

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.PluginEntity.TypeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the fully qualified type name of the plugin class. This is the complete type name including namespace that implements the IPlugin interface.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.PluginEntity.ExecutionTimeoutMs
member.summary: Gets or sets the execution timeout in milliseconds for this plugin. If the plugin execution exceeds this timeout, it will be cancelled. Default value is 30000ms (30 seconds).

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.PluginEntity.IsStateless
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the plugin should be treated as stateless. When true, plugin instances are always created fresh (no caching). When false, plugin instances are cached and reused for better performance. Default value is true for safety and predictability.

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.ProcessorEntity
member.summary: Represents a processor entity in the system. Contains Processor information including version, name, input schema ID, and output schema ID.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.ProcessorEntity.InputSchemaId
member.summary: Gets or sets the input schema identifier. This references the schema used for input validation.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.ProcessorEntity.OutputSchemaId
member.summary: Gets or sets the output schema identifier. This references the schema used for output validation.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.ProcessorEntity.ImplementationHash
member.summary: Gets or sets the SHA-256 hash of the processor implementation. Used for runtime integrity validation to ensure version consistency.

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.SchemaEntity
member.summary: Represents a schema entity in the system. Contains schema definition information including version, name, and JSON schema definition.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.SchemaEntity.Definition
member.summary: Gets or sets the JSON schema definition. This contains the actual schema structure and validation rules.

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.StepEntity
member.summary: Represents a step entity in the system. Contains Step information including version, name, processor reference, and workflow navigation.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.StepEntity.ProcessorId
member.summary: Gets or sets the processor identifier. This references the ProcessorEntity that will execute this step.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.StepEntity.NextStepIds
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of next step identifiers. This defines the possible next steps in the workflow after this step completes. Can be empty for terminal steps.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.StepEntity.EntryCondition
member.summary: Gets or sets the entry condition that determines when this step should execute. Controls the workflow execution logic and step transitions.

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.Validation.NoEmptyGuidsAttribute
member.summary: Validation attribute to ensure a collection of GUIDs does not contain any empty GUIDs (Guid.Empty).

member.name: M:Shared.Entities.Validation.NoEmptyGuidsAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NoEmptyGuidsAttribute class.

member.name: M:Shared.Entities.Validation.NoEmptyGuidsAttribute.IsValid(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified value is valid.
member.returns: true if the value is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Shared.Entities.Validation.NoEmptyGuidsAttribute.FormatErrorMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Formats the error message that is displayed when validation fails.
member.param: The name of the field that failed validation.

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.Validation.NotEmptyCollectionAttribute
member.summary: Validation attribute to ensure a collection is not null or empty.

member.name: M:Shared.Entities.Validation.NotEmptyCollectionAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NotEmptyCollectionAttribute class.

member.name: M:Shared.Entities.Validation.NotEmptyCollectionAttribute.IsValid(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified value is valid.
member.returns: true if the value is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Shared.Entities.Validation.NotEmptyCollectionAttribute.FormatErrorMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Formats the error message that is displayed when validation fails.
member.param: The name of the field that failed validation.

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.Validation.NotEmptyGuidAttribute
member.summary: Validation attribute to ensure a Guid is not empty (Guid.Empty).

member.name: M:Shared.Entities.Validation.NotEmptyGuidAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NotEmptyGuidAttribute class.

member.name: M:Shared.Entities.Validation.NotEmptyGuidAttribute.IsValid(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified value is valid.
member.returns: true if the value is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Shared.Entities.Validation.NotEmptyGuidAttribute.FormatErrorMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Formats the error message that is displayed when validation fails.
member.param: The name of the field that failed validation.

member.name: T:Shared.Entities.WorkflowEntity
member.summary: Represents a workflow entity in the system. Contains Workflow information including version, name, and step references.

member.name: P:Shared.Entities.WorkflowEntity.StepIds
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of step IDs that belong to this workflow. This creates referential integrity relationships with StepEntity records.
